Europeana Labs


Giving developers access to cultural and scientific images, texts and audiovisual collections
from Europe's leading cultural organisations
— all rights-cleared and ready to use.

GET STARTED
Use our API or go and experiment at one of our Spaces.


Get your API key.

Sign up for your free API key and get developing!
The rest is up to you.

Be inspired …

  • Europeana Culture Collage

    Europeana Culture Collage is developed by Monique Szpak (@zenlan) and started as a simple exercise in mashing up a few of the new web technologies, incl. Europeana API and Europeana visual data.

    Find out more

  • Biblioteca Digital Hispánica

    The National Library of Spain has implemented the Europeana API in their online portal, Biblioteca Digital Hispánica. The portal now enables their users to access related Europeana content via single link on their search result header.

    Find out more

See more examples in the Application Gallery →
